attributes.action: offer no official support to the campaign to see tony blair installed as president of europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: blair still has important questions to answer regarding the legality of his iraq war and he does not appear to command the support of the uk electorate, only that of his political cronies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
